result.markdown:
---
title: "Assignment 2"
author: "Jing Tao"
date: "Oct. 1, 2025"
format: html
---



# 1. Run Paul Murrell’s RGraphics basic R programs (murrell01.R)

a)  Run line by line and note the changes\
b)  Pay attention to the comments and answer the questions if any

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 1) Start plotting from basics (pressure + text)



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(pressure, pch=16); text(150, 600, "Pressure (mm Hg)\nversus\nTemperature (Celsius)")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## 2) Scatterplot — incremental low-level additions



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x  <- c(0.5, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16)
y1 <- c(1, 1.3, 1.9, 3.4, 3.9, 4.8)
y2 <- c(4, .8, .5, .45, .4, .3)


par(las=1, mar=c(4, 4, 2, 4), cex=.7)
plot.new()
plot.window(range(x), c(0, 6))
lines(x, y1)
lines(x, y2)
points(x, y1, pch=16, cex=2)                 # Try different cex?
points(x, y2, pch=21, bg="white", cex=2)     # Different background color
par(col="gray50", fg="gray50", col.axis="gray50")
axis(1, at=seq(0, 16, 4))                    # 1=bottom, 2=left, 3=top, 4=right
axis(2, at=seq(0, 6, 2))
axis(4, at=seq(0, 6, 2))
box(bty="u")
mtext("Travel Time (s)",          side=1, line=2, cex=0.8)
mtext("Responses per Travel",     side=2, line=2, las=0, cex=0.8)
mtext("Responses per Second",     side=4, line=2, las=0, cex=0.8)
text(4, 5, "Bird 131")
par(mar=c(5.1, 4.1, 4.1, 2.1), col="black", fg="black", col.axis="black")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## 3) Histogram with density curve



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Random data
Y <- rnorm(50)
# Make sure no Y exceed [-3.5, 3.5]
Y[Y < -3.5 | Y > 3.5] <- NA # Selection/set range
x <- seq(-3.5, 3.5, .1)
dn <- dnorm(x)
par(mar=c(4.5, 4.1, 3.1, 0))
hist(Y, breaks=seq(-3.5, 3.5), ylim=c(0, 0.5), 
     col="gray80", freq=FALSE)
lines(x, dnorm(x), lwd=2)
par(mar=c(5.1, 4.1, 4.1, 2.1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## 4) Barplot with labels



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
par(mar=c(2, 3.1, 2, 2.1)) 
midpts <- barplot(VADeaths, 
                  col=gray(0.1 + seq(1, 9, 2)/11), 
                  names=rep("", 4))
mtext(sub(" ", "\n", colnames(VADeaths)),
      at=midpts, side=1, line=0.5, cex=0.5)
text(rep(midpts, each=5), apply(VADeaths, 2, cumsum) - VADeaths/2,
     VADeaths, 
     col=rep(c("white", "black"), times=3:2), 
     cex=0.8)
par(mar=c(5.1, 4.1, 4.1, 2.1)) 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## 5) Boxplot



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
par(mar=c(3, 4.1, 2, 0))

boxplot(len ~ dose, data=ToothGrowth,
        boxwex=0.25, at=1:3 - 0.2,
        subset=supp=="VC", col="white",
        xlab="", ylab="tooth length", ylim=c(0, 35))

mtext("Vitamin C dose (mg)", side=1, line=2.5, cex=0.8)

boxplot(len ~ dose, data=ToothGrowth, add=TRUE,
        boxwex=0.25, at=1:3 + 0.2,
        subset=supp=="OJ")

legend(1.5, 9, c("Ascorbic acid", "Orange juice"),
       fill=c("white","gray"), bty="n")

par(mar=c(5.1, 4.1, 4.1, 2.1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## 6) Persp



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- seq(-10, 10, length=30)
y <- x
f <- function(x,y) { r <- sqrt(x^2 + y^2); 10 * sin(r)/r }
z <- outer(x, y, f); z[is.na(z)] <- 1
par(mar=c(0, 0.5, 0, 0), lwd=0.5)
persp(x, y, z, theta=30, phi=30, expand=0.5)
par(mar=c(5.1, 4.1, 4.1, 2.1), lwd=1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## 7) Piechart



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
par(mar=c(0, 2, 1, 2), xpd=FALSE, cex=0.5)
pie.sales <- c(0.12, 0.3, 0.26, 0.16, 0.04, 0.12)
names(pie.sales) <- c("Blueberry","Cherry","Apple","Boston Cream","Other","Vanilla")
pie(pie.sales, col=gray(seq(0.3, 1.0, length=6)))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## c) Plotting functions (note: exercise using the happy planet data set

# 0) Load HPI data



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)

hpi_path <- "/Users/jingtao/Desktop/FALL 2025/DATA VISUALIZATION/Assignment 2/HPI_2024_public_dataset.xlsx"  

df <- tryCatch(
  read_excel(hpi_path, sheet = "All Data", skip = 1),
  error = function(e) read_excel(hpi_path, sheet = "1. All countries", skip = 8)
)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
if ("LifeExp" %in% names(df)) {
  life_col    <- "LifeExp"                # All Data
  hpi_col     <- "HPI"
  country_col <- "Country"
  region_col  <- "Continent"
} else {
  life_col    <- "Life Expectancy (years)"  # 1. All countries
  hpi_col     <- "HPI"
  country_col <- "Country"
  region_col  <- "Continent"
}

ok    <- complete.cases(df[[life_col]], df[[hpi_col]])
x_le  <- as.numeric(df[[life_col]][ok])   # life expectancy
y_hpi <- as.numeric(df[[hpi_col]][ok])    # HPI score
cty   <- df[[country_col]][ok]
reg   <- df[[region_col]][ok]

length(x_le); length(y_hpi)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 2135
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 2135
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
head(data.frame(country = cty, lifeexp = x_le, hpi = y_hpi), 6)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
      country lifeexp      hpi
1     Vanuatu  70.449 57.86116
2      Sweden  82.983 55.93532
3 El Salvador  70.748 54.67388
4  Costa Rica  77.023 54.13215
5   Nicaragua  73.837 53.56492
6     Denmark  81.375 53.04326
```


:::
:::



## i. par()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
par(las=1, mar=c(4,4,1.5,1))  
plot(x_le, y_hpi, pch=16,
     xlab="Life expectancy (years)", ylab="HPI score")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## ii. lines()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(x_le, y_hpi, pch=16,
     xlab="Life expectancy", ylab="HPI score")
o <- order(x_le)
lines(x_le[o], y_hpi[o], lwd=1.3)  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## iii. points()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot.new()
plot.window(range(x_le, na.rm=TRUE), range(y_hpi, na.rm=TRUE))
axis(1); axis(2); box()
points(x_le, y_hpi, pch=21, bg="white", cex=1.1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## iv. axis()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot.new()
plot.window(range(x_le, na.rm=TRUE), range(y_hpi, na.rm=TRUE))
axis(1, at = pretty(range(x_le,  na.rm=TRUE)))    
axis(2, at = pretty(range(y_hpi, na.rm=TRUE)))    
axis(3, labels=FALSE)                              
axis(4, labels=FALSE)                              
box()
points(x_le, y_hpi, pch=16)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## v. box()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot.new(); plot.window(c(0,1), c(0,1))
box(bty="u")  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## vi. text()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
par(las=1, mar=c(4,4,1,1))

ylim <- range(y_hpi, na.rm = TRUE)
ylim[2] <- ylim[2] * 1.08

plot(x_le, y_hpi, pch = 16,
     xlab = "Life expectancy", ylab = "HPI score",
     ylim = ylim)

best <- which.max(y_hpi)
lab  <- if (!is.null(cty) && !is.na(cty[best]) && nchar(cty[best]) > 0)
          as.character(cty[best]) else "Top country"

points(x_le[best], y_hpi[best], pch = 21, bg = "white", cex = 1.3)

text(x_le[best], y_hpi[best], labels = lab, pos = 3, cex = 0.9, xpd = NA)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## vii. mtext()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(x_le, y_hpi, pch=16,
     xlab="Life expectancy", ylab="HPI score")
mtext("Bottom margin text", side=1, line=2)
mtext("Left margin text",   side=2, line=2)
mtext("Top margin text",    side=3, line=0.5)
mtext("Right margin text",  side=4, line=0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## viii. hist()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
par(mar=c(4.5,4,1,1))
hist(y_hpi, col="gray80", freq=FALSE,
     main="Distribution of HPI", xlab="HPI score")
curve(dnorm(x, mean(y_hpi, na.rm=TRUE), sd(y_hpi, na.rm=TRUE)),
      add=TRUE, lwd=2)
par(mar=c(5.1,4.1,4.1,2.1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## ix. boxplot() + x. legend()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
if (!is.null(reg)) {
  par(mar=c(6,4,1,1), las=2)
  boxplot(y_hpi ~ reg, col="white",
          ylab="HPI score", xlab="")
  legend("topleft", legend="Regions", bty="n")
  par(mar=c(5.1,4.1,4.1,2.1), las=0)
} else {
  plot.new(); text(0.5,0.5,"No region/continent column found.", cex=1.1)
}
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## xi. persp()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- seq(-10, 10, length=30); y <- x
f <- function(x,y){ r <- sqrt(x^2 + y^2); 10*sin(r)/r }
z <- outer(x, y, f); z[is.na(z)] <- 1
par(mar=c(0,0.5,0,0), lwd=0.5)
persp(x, y, z, theta=30, phi=30, expand=0.5)
par(mar=c(5.1,4.1,4.1,2.1), lwd=1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## xii. names() + xiii. pie()



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
if (!is.null(reg)) {
  tab  <- sort(table(reg), decreasing=TRUE)
  vals <- as.numeric(tab)
  names(vals) <- names(tab)   
  pie(vals, col = gray(seq(0.3, 1.0, length.out=length(vals))),
      main = "Share of countries by region")
} else {
  plot.new(); text(0.5,0.5,"No region/continent column found.", cex=1.1)
}
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](A2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
